smart_contract:
from pyteal import *

def secure_fee_contract():
    fee_limit = Int(1000)

    txn1 = Seq([
        Assert(Txn.fee() <= fee_limit),
        Assert(Txn.close_remainder_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.rekey_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Return(Int(1))
    ])

    txn2 = Seq([
        Assert(Txn.close_remainder_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.rekey_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Return(Int(1))
    ])

    txn3 = Seq([
        Assert(Txn.fee() <= fee_limit),
        Assert(Txn.close_remainder_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Assert(Txn.rekey_to() == Global.zero_address()),
        Return(Int(1))
    ])

    program = Cond(
        [Txn.group_index() == Int(0), txn1],
        [Txn.group_index() == Int(1), txn2],
        [Txn.group_index() == Int(2), txn3]
    )

    return program

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(compileTeal(secure_fee_contract(), mode=Mode.Signature, version=5))
